channel.title: The New York Times on North Brooklyn Angels
channel.description: Recent content in The New York Times on North Brooklyn Angels

item.title: We Met Them in the Depths of the Pandemic. How Are They Doing Now?
item.description: Checking in with the blues bassist, the homeless student, the hipster priest and the lesbian couple who survived the Spanish flu and the Holocaust.

item.title: How to Help in a Pandemic: Ask Before You Donate 1,000 Pizzas
item.description: A Brooklyn priest learned to cut through the red tape after Hurricane Sandy. He has lessons for us.
